issue.title: [C++] gandiva-micro_benchmarks is broken in MSVC build
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4864](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4864). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Not a blocking issue for 0.13. I encountered this when debugging the CMake refactor branch with Visual Studio 2015
